content:
As an AI language model, I cannot provide the latest updates. However, as of 2021, here are some ways Epilogue has adapted to new technology and social media to promote their music and engage with fans:

1. Online streaming - Epilogue has released their music on various online music streaming platforms like Spotify, Apple Music, and YouTube Music to reach a wider audience.

2. Social media presence - The band maintains an active presence on social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram, where they connect with fans, share updates, and promote their music.

3. Music videos - Epilogue has created music videos and posted them on YouTube, reaching fans beyond just the audio tracks.

4. Merchandise - They have developed Epilogue merchandise, including clothing and accessories, which fans can purchase online.

5. Live streaming - In times of social distancing, Epilogue has made live streaming of their performances possible through various platforms.

6. Collaborations - They have collaborated with other artists and musicians, leveraging social media to promote their music and their partners' music.

7. Podcasts - The band has created and shared podcasts discussing their music and the journey of their music.
